attributes.action: Seriously look at the alcohol licensing laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Supermarkets, shops and garages should not be allowed to sell alcohol. Pub's and well controlled Off-License's are responsible ways of selling alcohol. The pub trade controls alcohol intake responsibly and will stop serving someone who has had too much to drink. They will not serve underage drinkers. This will help extinguish the problem of underage drinkers in the park etc scenario, which is the route cause of so much trouble these days.
